Package components

Class Truck

java.lang.Object
components.Truck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Node, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonStandardTruck, StandardTruck, Van
public abstract class Truck
extends java.lang.Object
implements Node, java.lang.Cloneable
This class represents the vehicles (trucks) that transport packages between the hub and the other branches
Version:
2.00 11 juni 2021
Author:
Israel Avihail 308298363, Ofir Golan 315585323
See Also:
Package, Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Truck()
    Random default constructor that produces an truck with a license plate and model of a vehicle randomly
    Truck​(java.lang.String licensePlate, java.lang.String truckModel)
    Regular constructor that receives as arguments a number plate and model of the vehicle and creates a truck accordingly
